actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to establish the birthplace of Susan B. Anthony in Adams, Mass., as a national historic site.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire on behalf of the United States the house and lot in Adams, Massachusetts, where Susan B. Anthony was born. Provides that the Secretary, acting through the National Park Service, shall administer such premises as a national historic site.

titles.title: A bill to establish the birthplace of Susan B. Anthony in Adams, Mass., as a national historic site.
